detailsData.title: Over 42 Years Of Experience
detailsData.content: With over 42 years of combined experience, you can trust in our research capabilities, proactive risk assessment and avoidance, and our legal judgment. We work hard to be prepared throughout the case, but we focus on consistently making efforts to find a solution before trial.

detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: Regardless of whether you retain our firm for litigation, estate planning, or transactional work, we are always accessible, respond quickly to client emails, and work hard to find a solution to your problem. Know that when you partner with us, you get a well-known and esteemed team of attorneys on your side.

detailsData.title: Flat Fees for Estate Planning
detailsData.content: At The Heritage Law Group, we work in a timely, cost-effective and efficient manner using our vast legal knowledge and expert communication skills to resolve disputes. We have a reputation for being trustworthy and we take that very seriously.

address: 2033 Gateway Pl, Suite 500, San Jose, CA 95110
valueProp: The Heritage Law Group is a reputable law firm with over 42 years of combined experience, offering personalized legal services in real estate, business law, estate planning, and probate.
openHours: Mon - Fri 9:00 am - 5:00 pm, Sat - Sun Closed
